about_the_game:
GamePlay

Enjoy a sensual story while completing tricky puzzles!
Connect the numbers sequentially, using all of the squares on the board
After completing a puzzle, you will unlock a sexy new image and the next part of the story!
Can you complete every puzzle and meet all of the girls?!

Story Background

As exchange students, Astrid Lindström and her mother Helena Lindström arranged to live together in the protagonist's house to facilitate their in-depth understanding of Japanese culture...
What happens there?

Characters

Astrid Lindström:

A Nordic girl with silver hair and blue eyes, her innocent personality makes this snow country rose bloom in a foreign country, and the Swedish she occasionally speaks is even more cute.

Helena Lindström:

The gestures exude the elegant charm of the Nordic goddess, but they don't lose their true nature.She learned Japanese a long time ago, but she learned it from pornography.

Features

  • 20 sexy and erotic images of beautiful girls.
  • A fantastical erotic story with girls who have unique personalities.
  • You can skip the puzzles if you just want to enjoy the story. (Press Enter during a puzzle).
  • CG Gallery mode. (Click the left and right buttons next to the CG after completing a puzzle).

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains a large amount of extremely sexual content.
It may not be appropriate for all audiences.
Please make your own judgment before playing the game whether you meet the requirements for playing such games.
The story is purely fictional.
All characters appearing in this game are adults over 18 years old.
